definition: to temper (iron)/to flare back/flareback (in a gas burner)/(of an engine) to backfire
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Tempering offers a means of obtaining various combinations of mechanical properties.
sentences.chinese: 回火提供了獲得各種綜合機械性能的方法。

sentences.english: After having been tempered, the steel becomes stronger because its grains get finer.
sentences.chinese: 經過回火之後，鋼的強度增大，因爲其晶粒變細了。

sentences.english: The tempering process and the sub-zero treatment can control the amount of residual austenite effectively.
sentences.chinese: 回火和深冷處理工藝可以有效地控制殘餘奧氏體量。

sentences.english: Flashback is one of the major problems in lean premixed combustion of gas turbine combustor.
sentences.chinese: 回火問題是貧燃料預混燃燒面臨的主要問題之一。

sentences.english: Effects of different tempering processes on surface microstructure of indefinite chill cast-iron roller were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了回火工藝對無限冷硬軋輥表層基體組織的影響。

sentences.english: The tempering operation may be described as one of precipitation and agglomeration or coalescence of cementite.
sentences.chinese: 回火作業可以描述爲滲碳體析出和凝聚或聚結的過程。

sentences.english: It is made of rustproof tempering steel with a satin-finish surface.
sentences.chinese: 它由防鏽的回火鋼製成，具有緞光表面。

sentences.english: There are slow rise and slow decline functions of tempering.
sentences.chinese: 回火具有緩升緩降功能。

sentences.english: Tempering by grinding heat causes hardness change at the surface of the hardened steels .
sentences.chinese: 磨削熱導致回火引起淬硬鋼磨削後表面硬度變化。

sentences.english: The tempered structure had a little bainite.
sentences.chinese: 回火組織中出現少量貝氏體。

sentences.english: The hardenability is irrelevant to the isothermal tempering temperature.
sentences.chinese: 淬透性與等溫回火溫度無關。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: The old truck made a sudden backfire which sounded like a firecracker.
sentences.chinese: 舊卡車突然出現回火，聲音像放爆竹一般。

sentences.english: An automatic control system of tempering heat treatment for welded drill pipe is presented in the paper .
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一套對焊鑽桿回火熱處理自動控制系統。

sentences.english: The temper brittleness of T23 steel was studied through heat treatment experiment.
sentences.chinese: 通過熱處理試驗對T23鋼的回火脆性進行了研究。

sentences.english: However, a temper brittleness has appeared after high temper.
sentences.chinese: 空冷後高溫回火產生回火脆性。

sentences.english: However, a temper brittleness has appeared after high temper.
sentences.chinese: 空冷後高溫回火產生回火脆性。

definition: to quench/to temper/to harden by quenching
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
